divs: sighting details this is kind of hard to explain without drawing a picture, but i will try. my father, myself, and my brother-in-law all witnessed this event although my brother-in-law *(name deleted--cms\sg) was in a different area at the time but no further than a mile away. my father and i were standing outside at dusk. it was not completely dark but close. i believe the moon was farely bright also. a thin layer of clouds could be seen almost like a fog but higher up in the sky. my father and myself had been talking and we happened to notice what at first appeared to be a plane or something similar, but as we watched this "red-orange" object it began to rise from the horizon\tree line straight up without making any noise. as it got further from the horizon\treeline it began to glow more intense and then slowly it appeared to emit a conic shaped light upwards from the object in the same red-orange color. it continued to do this until it finally disappeared. however a circular hole could be seen in the clouds that i discribed earlier. my husband had been deer hunting with his brother. my husband did not see anything but when i tried to tell him what we had witnessed he said, "i know i know tracey saw it too. he almost knocked me out of the tree stand. he kept yelling there is a "v" in the sky. this was the way in which he discribed it. there was supposed to be a meteor shower within 3 days or so of our sighting, but i have watched meteor showers in the past and not one single time did i see one rise from the horizon and do this. they general streak across the sky and do not remain visible for that length of time. could anyone tell me if this is something that could easily be explained? this has bother me for sometime because i do not know what we saw. thank you **(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
